1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2012, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing s2s connection
    4: %%% @end
    5: %%%===================================================================
    6: 
    7: -module(s2s_SUITE).
    8: -compile(export_all).
    9: 
   10: -import(distributed_helper, [rpc/4, rpc/5]).
   11: 
   12: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   13: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   14: 
   15: -record(s2s_opts, {
   16:           node1_s2s_certfile = undefined,
   17:           node1_s2s_use_starttls = undefined,
   18:           node2_s2s_certfile = undefined,
   19:           node2_s2s_use_starttls = undefined
   20:          }).
   21: 
   22: %%%===================================================================
   23: %%% Suite configuration
   24: %%%===================================================================
   25: 
   26: all() ->
   27:     [
   28:      {group, both_plain},
   29:      {group, both_tls_optional}, %% default MongooseIM config
   30:      {group, both_tls_required},
   31: 
   32:      {group, node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required},
   33:      {group, node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional},
   34: 
   35:      {group, node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional},
   36: 
   37:      {group, node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional},
   38:      {group, node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false},
   39: 
   40:      {group, node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required},
   41:      {group, node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false}
   42: 
   43:     ].
   44: 
   45: groups() ->
   46:     [{both_plain, [sequence], all_tests()},
   47:      {both_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   48:      {both_tls_required, [], essentials()},
   49: 
   50:      {node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required, [], essentials()},
   51:      {node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   52: 
   53:      %% Node1 closes connection with "self-signed certificate" reason
   54:      {node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional, [], negative()},
   55: 
   56:      {node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   57:      {node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false, [], essentials()},
   58: 
   59:      {node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required, [], negative()},
   60:      {node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false, [], negative()}
   61:     ].
   62: 
   63: essentials() ->
   64:     [simple_message].
   65: 
   66: all_tests() ->
   67:     essentials() ++ [nonexistent_user, unknown_domain].
   68: 
   69: negative() ->
   70:     [timeout_waiting_for_message].
   71: 
   72: suite() ->
   73:     require_s2s_nodes() ++
   74:     escalus:suite().
   75: 
   76: require_s2s_nodes() ->
   77:     [{require, mim_node, {hosts, mim, node}},
   78:      {require, fed_node, {hosts, fed, node}}].
   79: 
   80: %%%===================================================================
   81: %%% Init & teardown
   82: %%%===================================================================
   83: 
   84: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   85:     Node1S2SCertfile = rpc(mim(), ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_certfile]),
   86:     Node1S2SUseStartTLS = rpc(mim(), ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls]),
   87: 
   88:     rpc(fed(), mongoose_cover_helper, start, [[ejabberd]]),
   89: 
   90:     Node2S2SCertfile = rpc(fed(), ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_certfile]),
   91:     Node2S2SUseStartTLS = rpc(fed(), ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls]),
   92:     S2S = #s2s_opts{node1_s2s_certfile = Node1S2SCertfile,
   93:                     node1_s2s_use_starttls = Node1S2SUseStartTLS,
   94:                     node2_s2s_certfile = Node2S2SCertfile,
   95:                     node2_s2s_use_starttls = Node2S2SUseStartTLS},
   96: 
   97:     Config1 = [{s2s_opts, S2S} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config0)],
   98:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice2, bob2, alice, bob])).
   99: 
  100: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  101:     S2SOrig = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  102:     configure_s2s(S2SOrig),
  103:     rpc(fed(), mongoose_cover_helper, analyze, []),
  104:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])),
  105:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  106: 
  107: init_per_group(both_plain, Config) ->
  108:     configure_s2s(#s2s_opts{}),
  109:     Config;
  110: init_per_group(both_tls_optional, Config) ->
  111:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config), %The initial config assumes that both nodes are configured to use encrypted s2s
  112:     configure_s2s(S2S),
  113:     Config;
  114: init_per_group(both_tls_required, Config) ->
  115:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  116:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required,
  117:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  118:     Config;
  119: init_per_group(node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required, Config) ->
  120:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  121:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  122:     Config;
  123: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  124:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  125:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  126:     Config;
  127: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  128:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  129:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required_trusted}),
  130:     Config;
  131: init_per_group(node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  132:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  133:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  134:     Config;
  135: init_per_group(node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false, Config) ->
  136:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  137:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node2_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  138:     Config;
  139: init_per_group(node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required, Config) ->
  140:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  141:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = false,
  142:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  143:     Config;
  144: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false, Config) ->
  145:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  146:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required,
  147:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  148:     Config;
  149: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  153:     ok.
  154: 
  155: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  156:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  157: 
  158: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  159:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  160: 
  161: %%%===================================================================
  162: %%% Server-to-server communication test
  163: %%%===================================================================
  164: 
  165: simple_message(Config) ->
  166:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice2, 1}, {alice, 1}], fun(Alice2, Alice1) ->
  167: 
  168:         %% User on the main server sends a message to a user on a federated server
  169:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice2, <<"Hi, foreign Alice!">>)),
  170: 
  171:         %% User on the federated server receives the message
  172:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2, 10000),
  173:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, foreign Alice!">>], Stanza),
  174: 
  175:         %% User on the federated server sends a message to the main server
  176:         escalus:send(Alice2, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice1, <<"Nice to meet you!">>)),
  177: 
  178:         %% User on the main server receives the message
  179:         Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1, 10000),
  180:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Nice to meet you!">>], Stanza2)
  181: 
  182:     end).
  183: 
  184: timeout_waiting_for_message(Config) ->
  185:     try
  186:         simple_message(Config),
  187:         ct:fail("got message but shouldn't")
  188:     catch
  189:         error:timeout_when_waiting_for_stanza ->
  190:             ok
  191:     end.
  192: 
  193: nonexistent_user(Config) ->
  194:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {alice2, 1}], fun(Alice1, Alice2) ->
  195: 
  196:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Xyz@localhost2
  197:         RemoteServer = escalus_client:server(Alice2),
  198:         Fake = <<"xyz@", RemoteServer/binary>>,
  199:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Fake,
  200:                                                     <<"Hello, nonexistent!">>)),
  201: 
  202:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives stanza error: service-unavailable
  203:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  204:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"service-unavailable">>], Stanza)
  205: 
  206:     end).
  207: 
  208: unknown_domain(Config) ->
  209:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice1) ->
  210: 
  211:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Xyz@localhost3
  212:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(
  213:             <<"xyz@somebogushost">>,
  214:             <<"Hello, unreachable!">>)),
  215: 
  216:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives stanza error: remote-server-not-found
  217:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1, 10000),
  218:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"remote-server-not-found">>], Stanza)
  219: 
  220:     end).
  221: 
  222: nonascii_addr(Config) ->
  223:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob2, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  224: 
  225:         %% Bob@localhost2 sends message to Alice@localhost1
  226:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Cześć Alice!">>)),
  227: 
  228:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives message from Bob@localhost2
  229:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 10000),
  230:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Cześć Alice!">>], Stanza),
  231: 
  232:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Bob@localhost2
  233:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Miło Cię poznać">>)),
  234: 
  235:         %% Bob@localhost2 receives message from Alice@localhost1
  236:         Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 10000),
  237:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Miło Cię poznać">>], Stanza2)
  238: 
  239:     end).
  240: 
  241: configure_s2s(#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_certfile = Certfile1,
  242:                         node1_s2s_use_starttls = StartTLS1,
  243:                         node2_s2s_certfile = Certfile2,
  244:                         node2_s2s_use_starttls = StartTLS2}) ->
  245:     configure_s2s(mim(), Certfile1, StartTLS1),
  246:     configure_s2s(fed(), Certfile2, StartTLS2),
  247:     restart_s2s().
  248: 
  249: configure_s2s(Node, Certfile, StartTLS) ->
  250:     rpc(Node, ejabberd_config, add_local_option, [s2s_certfile, Certfile]),
  251:     rpc(Node, ejabberd_config, add_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls, StartTLS]).
  252: 
  253: restart_s2s() ->
  254:     restart_s2s(mim()),
  255:     restart_s2s(fed()).
  256: 
  257: restart_s2s(Node) ->
  258:     Children = rpc(Node, supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_s2s_out_sup]),
  259:     [rpc(Node, ejabberd_s2s_out, stop_connection, [Pid]) ||
  260:      {_, Pid, _, _} <- Children],
  261: 
  262:     ChildrenIn = rpc(Node, supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_s2s_in_sup]),
  263:     [rpc(Node, erlang, exit, [Pid, kill]) ||
  264:      {_, Pid, _, _} <- ChildrenIn].
  265: 
  266: mim() ->
  267:     get_or_fail(mim_node).
  268: 
  269: fed() ->
  270:     get_or_fail(fed_node).
  271: 
  272: get_or_fail(Key) ->
  273:     Val = ct:get_config(Key),
  274:     Val == undefined andalso error({undefined, Key}),
  275:     Val.
